title: Watch Face - Elegant Wear
summary: Elegant and customizable watch face for android wear by YSAR Design.
developerAddress:
City of London
London, EC4V3EJ
United Kingdom
description: This Elegant watch face is an absolute symbol of style. Watch faces by YSAR Design are compatible with both round and square android wear smartwatches: Moto 360, Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 etc..Custom features:-  Application for customization -  Battery indicator-  Date-  Second time-zone watch-  Ambient mode-  Advanced and luxury design with superb readability, elegant and modern style, for men and womenFunctions:- Choose the color of frame and indicators' arrows- Choose between analog and digital versions of battery indicator, date and second time-zone watch- Turn on/off the indicatorsOur application is available right after you download from store and are simple in being set up. YSAR watch faces do not require much electric energy, so your smartwatch will operate for almost the same period of time as usual.Check out our watch faces with different features and designs: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=YSAR+Design.We have analog and digital watch faces, watch faces with skulls, celebrities, space theme etc... We are trying to match any taste by introducing different watches of all styles.Please, rate, share and write comments, because we want to improve our watch faces and satisfy your needs.Be special with YSAR Design.
descriptionHTML:
This Elegant watch face is an absolute symbol of style. Watch faces by YSAR Design are compatible with both round and square android wear smartwatches: Moto 360, Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 etc..

Custom features:
- Application for customization
- Battery indicator
- Date
- Second time-zone watch
- Ambient mode
- Advanced and luxury design with superb readability, elegant and modern style, for men and women

Functions:
- Choose the color of frame and indicators' arrows
- Choose between analog and digital versions of battery indicator, date and second time-zone watch
- Turn on/off the indicators

Our application is available right after you download from store and are simple in being set up. YSAR watch faces do not require much electric energy, so your smartwatch will operate for almost the same period of time as usual.

Check out our watch faces with different features and designs: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=YSAR+Design.
We have analog and digital watch faces, watch faces with skulls, celebrities, space theme etc... We are trying to match any taste by introducing different watches of all styles.

Please, rate, share and write comments, because we want to improve our watch faces and satisfy your needs.

Be special with YSAR Design.
comments: This watch face is literally awesome. Indicators work and I love the choice between analog and digital formats. Well done
Nice minimalist design I like the minimalist and elegant look. Also love the customisation feature. Well done!
Dials screwy The mini dials in the analog accessories are not aligned with the rings! Please let me know if there is a fix...
Much better with the update Better looking, better readability, more appealing since the update. I like the more customization given to the app. Very happy.
Look awesome! I like the design and the colors!
Misaligned The arms on the small dials are all misaligned on the LG G Watch. All arms are down and to the right of center.
